Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the interior is spotted in parts with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and very faint traces of three lines of black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394231) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394231)
